paper_abstract: The concept of intuitionistic fuzzy subhyperquasigroups in a hyperquasigroup with respect to an s-norm and a t-norm on intuitionistic fuzzy sets is introduced and their properties of such hyperquasigroups are studied. Intuitionistic (S, T)-fuzzy relations on a hyperquasigroup G are discussed. In particular, we investigate connections hyperquasigroups with binary quasigroups.
